summary: WE HAVE TAKEN OUR 2000 SUBURBAN IN 9 TIMES TO GET THE WATER LEAK PROBLEM FIXED AT ASHEVILLE CHEVROLET.  THE MOISTURE CAUSES HEADACHES IN MY 9 YR OLD SON.  WE DON'T KNOW WHAT ALL MIGHT BE GROWING IN THE CARPET.  WE BOUGHT NEW CARPET THE LAST TIME AND WERE TOLD THE PROBLEM WAS SOLVED.  2 WEEKS LATER (THE FIRST RAIN) AND WE HAVE A WET CARPET AGAIN AND OUR SON HAS ANOTHER HEADACHE.
